definition: camp/barracks/battalion/to build/to operate/to manage/to strive for

sentences.english: These camp robbers hae become habituated to campers as a food source.
sentences.chinese: 这些营地掠夺者已经惯于将野营者作为一种食物来源。

sentences.english: There is a camp ground near the run ways.
sentences.chinese: 在机场跑道附近有一个野营地。

sentences.english: The children are always excited to start off on a lamping trip.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在出发野营时总是非常兴奋。

sentences.english: Who are you going camping with this week?
The troops will be passing through our village on their camping trip.
sentences.chinese: 野营部队要从咱们村过。

sentences.english: If you go camping you'll have to rough it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去参加野营，你就得过艰苦简陋的生活。

sentences.english: Camping on a rocky outcrop in Stockholm Archipelag.
sentences.chinese: 斯德哥尔摩群岛上露出地面岩层的野营。

sentences.english: We had a piCoM. cNic thereand then we went fishing , went camping and fle kites.
sentences.chinese: 我们在那里野餐然后我们去钓鱼去野营通过风筝。

sentences.english: When we go camping, I hike in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 当我们去野营的时候，我在树林里步行。

sentences.english: Becky and John enjoyed camping in our big national forests on their vacations.
sentences.chinese: 贝基和约翰喜欢假期中去我们广袤的国家森林野营。

sentences.english: Seto crash site near Lake Palace, there are many campgrounds, and around the cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 坠机现场靠近宫濑湖，周围有许多野营地和陵园。

sentences.english: If you go camping, at night you'll hear all the nocturnal animals.
sentences.chinese: 如果你去野营，晚上可以听见动物的夜歌。

sentences.english: The men of bivouac made the clean forest land into great confusion.
sentences.chinese: 野营者们把干净的林地搞得乱七八糟。

sentences.english: I have the camping things stored away till we need them.
sentences.chinese: 我把野营用的东西收起来了，用的时候再拿出来。

sentences.english: Have you packed your things for the camping trip?
sentences.chinese: 你把你野营时要用的东西打好包没有？

sentences.english: My wife invited Kristy to go camping with us .
sentences.chinese: 我夫人邀请克里斯蒂和我们一起去野营。

definition: to cook a meal over a campfire (usu. for a group of people on an outing)/cookout
to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
outing in the country/to go on a hike/to go courting
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
